General.Name: Vibe Growth Corporation
General.Description: Vibe Growth Corporation engages in the cultivation, production, retail, and distribution of cannabis for recreation and medicinal use. The company operates retail and e-commerce platform under the Vibe By California brand. It is also involved in the indoor cultivation; commercial distribution and transportation; e-commerce and home delivery; and manufacture of marijuana products. The company was formerly known as Vibe Bioscience Ltd. and changed its name to Vibe Growth Corporation in October 2020. Vibe Growth Corporation was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Sacramento, California.
General.Address: 8112 Alpine Ave, Sacramento, CA, United States, 95826
